Posts.Content: Hello Im in the same scernario almost, the doctors are sayin my mom has cancer in the chest wall and the right lung. They say she has a couple of months to live. All i can offer to you is that i will pray for your sister. Thats what i have been doing for my mom and believe me it works the doctors said she should of died months ago, whats keeping her alive? The power of prayer is i dont know if you even believe in god, but he is real and he heals. So if you want you can email me her name. We tried everything else why not god? Best regards
Posts.Title: Spread to The Brain and Lungs.
